title: Psychodrome II: The Shapechanger Scenario
description: The ultimate reality adventure show is a real alien invasion.... Tune in to your favorite reality adventure stars and plug into their minds for the ultimate reality adventure. Psychodrome is the world's most popular psych-fidelity show, where the home audience can choose their favorite stars and use their psi-fi sets to share consciousness with them as they compete in the ultimate reality adventure game. From erotic adventures to fantasy adventure quests, there is a scenario for every taste. But the latest game scenario is more than just a game. Psychodrome's latest entertainment is an alien attack, where a race of predatory shapechangers has launched an invasion of humanity. Able to assume the shape and memories of any creature they consume, the ambimorphs are now among us ... and so long as people believe that it is nothing but a fantasy adventure game, they won't panic. Because the truth is that the shapechanger scenario is REAL.
author: Simon Hawke
